title: MicroStrategy Stock Surges 24% as Bitcoin Nears All-Time High Price
description: The only time MSTR was priced higher than today was back in 2000.

title: SEC Pushes Back BlackRock Spot Ethereum ETF Application—Again
description: With the blockbuster success of spot Bitcoin ETFs, Ethereum-based counterparts are increasingly in demand.

title: Why is the crypto market up today?
description:
The crypto market is up today as institutional inflows, total open interest, and Bitcoin market cap all target new highs.

The crypto market is up today, with the global market capitalization rising by 5.8% to rest at $2.51 trillion on March 4. This movement has increased Bitcoin’s (BTC) market dominance to 53.3% as the pioneer cryptocurrency’s market capitalization hit a new all-time high.

Bitcoin (BTC) has rallied 8.5% over the last 24 hours to hit an intra-day high of $68,602 on March 4. Ether (ETH), Cardano (ADA), XRP (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE) and other top-cap altcoins also rallied higher.

Let’s look at the major factors driving the crypto market today.

Read more

title: MicroStrategy launches $600 million notes offering to fuel Bitcoin acquisition as stock surges
description:
MicroStrategy announced plans to offer $600 million in convertible senior notes due 2030 to fund further acquisitions of Bitcoin after its stock price surged 20% in the early hours of trading on March 4. The private offering is aimed at qualified institutional buyers and is subject to market conditions and other factors. The move aims to […]

title: Michael Saylor foresees a decade of Bitcoin boom with AI’s help
description: In a recent panel at the Bitcoin Atlantis conference on March 1, MicroStrategy co-founder and executive chairman Michael Saylor highlighted the potential of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and autonomous artificial intelligence (AI) in driving a significant institutional adoption phase for Bitcoin. Saylor’s insights suggest that these developments could trigger a “gold rush” era for […]

title: BlackRock’s Ethereum Trust ETF faces another delay from SEC
description: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has deferred its decision on the Ether ETF proposal submitted by BlackRock, marking another postponement in the cryptocurrency ETF space.  This delay follows a similar action taken in January when the SEC decided to hold off on BlackRock’s application after approving a series of Bitcoin ETFs. The development aligns […]

title: Tether overcomes scrutiny to secure $100 billion valuation
description: Tether’s USDT stablecoin briefly surpassed a market capitalization of $100 billion for the first time, as reported by CoinGecko. This achievement underscores the growing prominence of stablecoins in the digital asset market, particularly against the backdrop of a broader crypto market rally. According to Tether’s official website, despite the total number of USDT tokens being […]
